The expected close date is set for July 11, with a focus on expediting legal reviews and onboarding processes.

Email_Draft.subject: Follow-Up on Proposal and Next Steps
Email_Draft.body:
Hi Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to follow up on the proposal I sent over regarding the Sales Suite Upgrade. Please let me know if there are any questions or if you need further clarification on the implementation support details.

Looking forward to your feedback.

Best,
Bruce

AI_GENERATED_FOLLOW_UP.Slack_Message: Hi Sophia, just checking in on the proposal and if there are any updates from your legal team. Let me know if you need anything from my side!
